LiquidRichText.Text: * Warm up :
-having Ss play the guessing game “What word
is it ?”
1. This word has 11 letters .
2. It is about things around us like air, water, land, trees, forest …
3. It is polluted now and it affects our life .
* Task 1
-We are having environmental problems . We can tell them in Vietnamese or English .
-introducing the new words
-guiding Ss to read these words
-introducing the situation
These are the pictures about environmental problems . Now I want you to work in pairs to match
these pictures with the noun phrases in the box . Before doing all of you should read these words . And you have 2’.
-getting feedback
Task 2 :
-asking :
1. Why do the writers of this book show us these pitures ? ( They want us to know that our environment is being polluted and we
should do something to save it .)
2. What activities to clean the environment in your school do you often do on big holidays ? ( Cleaning the school yard /
the classrooms / the streets , planting trees / flowers … )
-introducing the situation of the text : Mr Brown is talking to some volunteer conservationists . You must listen to the tape about
his talk and then find out the ideas to answer the guiding questions :
1. Where are Mr Brown and the volunteer conservationists ?
2. What are they going to do there ?
-having Ss listen to the tape and then answer the questions
-getting feedback
- introducing some new words
-reviewing the structure : conditional sentences
